short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chromium extension to generate 'source:' script from repository page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chromium extension to generate 'source:' script from the repository page. 

Key feature: 
- Generate the link-script to some file, folder or Git commit on Redmine's "Repository" page. 

Example: 
project-1:source:"root-2023|documents" => link to folder "documents" in the repository "root-2023" in "project-1"
project-1:commit:"git-pot-2023|e14b9b71ed8ae95d2d356763fdc5bf896544debe" => link to commit "e14b9b71ed8ae95d2d356763fdc5bf896544debe" in the repository "git-pot-2023" in "project-1"

******
Limited functions (only worked in the cooperation domain):
1. Better display style on Redmine's "Documents" page.
2. Double click images to shrink the height for better reading in Redmine's "Documents" or "Wiki" pages.
3. Additional "Copy Script" button on Redmine' "Issues" editing page to copy attachment link scripts.
